org.apereo.cas.web.flow

Class Pac4jWebflowConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.web.flow.AbstractCasWebflowConfigurer
      • org.apereo.cas.web.flow.Pac4jWebflowConfigurer

  • @Component(value="pac4jWebflowConfigurer")
public class Pac4jWebflowConfigurer
extends AbstractCasWebflowConfigurer
    The Pac4jWebflowConfigurer is responsible for adjusting the CAS webflow context for pac4j integration.
    Since:
    4.2
